name: criti-ai-monorepo
description: AI 기반 뉴스 신뢰도 분석 및 비판적 사고 훈련 플랫폼

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace backend dev" "yarn workspace challenge-web dev"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "yarn workspace backend dev" "yarn workspace challenge-web dev" "yarn workspace chrome-extension dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @criti-ai/shared build && yarn workspace challenge-web build && yarn workspace chrome-extension build && yarn workspace backend build
scripts.build:challenge: yarn workspace @criti-ai/shared build && yarn workspace challenge-web build
scripts.build:extension: yarn workspace @criti-ai/shared build && yarn workspace chrome-extension build

author: Criti AI 팀
